markdown:
<title level="1" right="Focus 1" pfs="Standard">
[Elemental Toss](/Spells.aspx?ID=2105)
<actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=721" />
<trait label="Attack" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=540" />
<trait label="Focus" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=511" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=645" />
<trait label="Sorcerer" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=148" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 264 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Bloodline**
[Elemental](/Bloodlines.aspx?ID=24)

<row gap="medium">

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 30 feet

**Target** 1 creature
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Defense**
AC

</row>

</column>

---

With a flick of your wrist, you fling a chunk of your elemental matter at your foe. Make a ranged spell attack roll, dealing 1d8 damage on a success and double damage on a critical success. This spell deals damage according to your elemental influence (for instance, slashing for air or fire for fire) and has your element's trait.

---
**Heightened (+1)** The damage increases by 1d8.
name: Elemental Toss

text: Elemental Toss Single Action Source Player Core 2 pg. 264 1.1 Bloodline Elemental Range 30 feet Target 1 creature Defense AC --- With a flick of your wrist, you fling a chunk of your elemental matter at your foe. Make a ranged spell attack roll, dealing 1d8 damage on a success and double damage on a critical success. This spell deals damage according to your elemental influence (for instance, slashing for air or fire for fire) and has your element's trait. --- Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 1d8.
